articles.title: Ethanol blending program saved Rs 24,300 crore foreign exchange in 2022-23: Hardeep Puri - The Economic Times
articles.description: India has already rolled out 20 per cent blended fuel, though in a phased manner, in April 2023 and widespread availability is expected in days to come. The government is ambitious of attaining 20 per cent ethanol-blended petrol by 2024-25 and 30 per cent by …
articles.content: Blending of ethanol into petrol has resulted in savings of over Rs 24,300 crore of foreign exchange in the supply year 2022-23, said Union Petroleum Minister Hardeep Puri on Wednesday.Public sector o… [+3346 chars]
